summary: Mature follower to accompany you in your adventures!
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][b]Tired of jailbait [color=#93c47d]generic elven[/color] and [color=#00ffff]weeaboo neco[/color] girls mods? 
Want your follower look like [color=#ff00ff]real mature women[/color]?
Then this mod is for you![/b][/center][/size]

[center][size=5][b]Behold![/b][/size]

[size=5]Her name is [color=#ff0000]AMALTEYA[/color], she is [color=#ff0000]Nord[/color] and she is Ginger. And yes, she is in her 30's! Maybe somewhere about 35? Actually I didn't asked her, coz she is [color=#ff0000]SPELLSWORD[/color] with [color=#ff0000]FIRE MASTERY[/color] in destruction spells!!! Ask her by yourself if you dare!
She have just returned from Elsweyr, where she spent last 15 years in studies and adventures. Now she is staying in Riverwood at Sleeping Giant Inn and is looking for somebody to accompany her in these harsh and wild lands of Skyrim. Will it be you? 

[/size]pssst... hey, guys... she is single and mariable...  ❤ (ɔˆз(ˆ⌣ˆc)[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/7hAWkxB.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000]

[center]Update (27.07.2017):  Fixed body/head textures mismatch. Uploaded version 1.1 [/center][/color]


[center][size=5][b]I[u]nstalla[/u][u]tion[/u]:[/b][/size][size=3] 
[/size]
[size=3]Just download it with mod manager you use and activate.[/size][/center]

[center][/center]
[center][size=3][b][u]Used mods:[/u]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]RaceMenu
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url]
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] 
[/size][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP(B) 7BASE CBBE Vanilla[/url] [/b][size=3]
[b][/b][/size][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal
[/url][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url][/size]


[size=4][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000]The best gratitude  you can give [/color][/font][color=#ff0000]to author[/color][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000] is endorse and upload [/color][/font][color=#ff0000]your character screenshots to this page! ;) [/color]
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]Have Fun!
[/size]
[/color]
[size=3][u][i]And sorry for my bad English :3[/i][/u][/size]
